```{r, include = FALSE}

setwd("G:/My Drive/LSE/Year 1/PP422 Data Science/WT/Group project/SME-informal-sector-colombia")

source("00_settings.R")
# DATA --------------------------------------------------------------------

emicron_mpi <- read_dta("Tables/emicron-informality-mpi.dta")

# Import department names
geo_code_labels <- read_excel("Data/GEIH-2023/DICCIONARIO_DATOS_BASES_ANONIMIZADAS_GEIH_2023.xlsx",
                              sheet = "geo_codes")


# SET UP ------------------------------------------------------------------

dpto_names <- geo_code_labels %>% 
  filter(abb == "dpto")

emicron_mpi <- emicron_mpi %>% 
  left_join(select(dpto_names, code, name),
            by = c("DPTO" = "code")) %>% 
  rename(dpto_label = name)
```


```{r}
emicron_mpi %>% 
  ggplot(aes(mpi_index, mpi_deprivations)) +
  geom_point(alpha = 1/50)+
  geom_smooth(method = "lm", formula = y ~ x)+
  # geom_line()+
  geom_abline(slope = 1, intercept = 0) +
  custom_theme()
```
 
### By Department

#### Weighted averages

```{r}
emicron_mpi %>% 
  
  group_by(dpto_label) %>% 
  summarise(mpi = weighted.mean(mpi_index, adj_weight, na.rm = T),
            deprivations = weighted.mean(mpi_deprivations, adj_weight, na.rm = T)) %>% 
  ungroup() %>% 
  
  ggplot(aes(mpi, deprivations)) +
  geom_point() +
  
  geom_abline(slope = 1, intercept = 0) +
  
  custom_theme()
```

#### Weighted rates

```{r}
emicron_mpi %>% 
  
  mutate(depriv_poor = as.numeric(mpi_deprivations >= 0.333)) %>% 
  
  group_by(dpto_label) %>% 
  summarise(mpi_rate = weighted.mean(mpi_poor, adj_weight, na.rm = T),
            depriv_rate = weighted.mean(depriv_poor, adj_weight, na.rm = T)) %>% 
  ungroup() %>% 
  
  ggplot(aes(mpi_rate, depriv_rate)) +
  geom_point() +
 
  geom_abline(slope = 1, intercept = 0) +
  
  custom_theme()
```
